title: The Night Adorer - Novel Updates
tags: Game Elements   Game Ranking System   Gamers   Handsome Male Lead   Male Protagonist   Reincarnated in a Game World   Sudden Strength Gain   Transmigration   Transported into a Game World
author: 中二的菌菇
description:
Professional player Su An accidentally transmigrates into the earliest version of 'Eternal Night'. 

The winter god of the northern frigid land has not yet fallen, and the Abyss of Sin in the center of the Ash Sea is still guarded by black knights.

Without the interference of the players, the road in front of Su An leads to two different destinies…>
